help-file.title: ECHO
help-file.content: With their advanced vocal capacities, Disharmonists are able to play their sounds with a resounding echo. This can cause their songs action to reverberate and 'echo' the original in a lesser strength. The effectiveness of this song echo is affected by their environment and terrain such as a mountainous region will enhance the likelihood of an echoed effect, and conversely you will never get an echo underwater.
